acf.page_content:
ROCKSTAR & 7-ELEVEN SNOWBOARD CONTEST
Official Rules

 

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY.
PURCHASE WILL NOT IMPROVE CHANCES OF WINNING.
MATHEMATICAL SKILL-TESTING QUESTION REQUIRED.

  1. How to Enter: The Rockstar & 7-Eleven Snowboard Contest (“Contest”) begins at 12:00:01 a.m. Pacific Time (“PT”) on 02/05/20 and ends at 11:59:59 a.m. PT on 03/31/20 (“Promotion Period”).

(i)    Step 1: Download the 7-Eleven App (the “App”) by texting “Rewards” to the mobile number 711247 (NOTE: The App is not compatible for download via mobile devices operating on the BlackBerry® or Windows® mobile operating systems); if you already have a member ID barcode skip Step 2 and go directly to Step 3.

(ii)     Other ways to create a 7Rewards account:

  1. A 7Rewards account may also be registered by joining online at 7rewards.ca
  2. 7Rewards cards may also be obtained at participating 7-Eleven stores across Canada. Card must be registered to participate.

(ii)   Step 2: Following all instructions provided via the App, create an account to obtain a scannable member ID barcode;

(iii)  Step 3: Once you have downloaded the App, scan your 7-Eleven member ID barcode to receive one (1) entry into the Contest for each qualifying purchase of a Participating Product. Maximum one (1) entry

NOTE: Text messaging fees may apply depending on the entrant’s mobile device carrier and text messaging package.  Such fees are the responsibility of the entrant/account holder. Text messaging may not be available in all areas or with all mobile service providers. Entrant must be the person in whose name the mobile device account for the mobile device used to enter the Contest via mobile device is registered (the “Mobile Account Holder”) or have the express permission of the Mobile Account Holder. Entries made via mobile device without the permission of the Mobile Account Holder may be disqualified, at the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. To obtain entries without making a purchase, visit www.7rewards.ca and complete the online entry form, following all online instructions including agreeing to be bound by the Official Contest rules. Limit one (1) entry every seven (7) days, during the Contest Period per person/email/mobile device account (you must complete in full a new online entry each 7-day period for each entry to be valid).

Product not available in all locations.

You may use only one (1) email address or mobile account to enter. If it is discovered by the Contest Sponsor (using any evidence or other information made available to or otherwise discovered by the Contest Sponsor) that any person has attempted to use multiple names, identities, multiple accounts, or, and/or any automated, macro, script, robotic or other system(s) or program(s) to enter or otherwise participate in or disrupt this Contest in any way (as determined by Contest Sponsor in its sole and absolute discretion); then he/she may be disqualified from the Contest in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor. Any entry may be rejected if (in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor) the entry is not fully completed with all required information and submitted and received during the Contest Period.

The Contest Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to require proof of identity and/or eligibility (in a form acceptable to the Contest Sponsor – including, without limitation, government-issued photo identification): (i) for the purposes of verifying an individual’s eligibility to participate in this Contest; (ii) for the purposes of verifying the eligibility and/or legitimacy of an entry (or a purported entry) for the purposes of this Contest; and/or (iii) for any other reason the Contest Sponsor deems necessary, in its sole and absolute discretion, for the purposes of administering this Contest in accordance with these Rules.  Failure to provide such proof to the complete satisfaction of the Contest Sponsor within the timeline specified by the Contest Sponsor may result in disqualification in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.

To participate via mobile, you must have a mobile phone with SMS messaging capabilities. You may incur standard text message or data charges from your wireless service provider for each message sent and/or received.  Check with your wireless service provider for details on these and other applicable charges.  Entrants are solely responsible for any such SMS charges or data charges.  Not all wireless carriers participate.  All entries must be received and recorded within the Contest Period.  The App’s computer is the official timekeeping device for this Contest.

In the event of a dispute over the identity of an entrant, the address associated to the email account set up in the App upon registration or email entry will be considered made by the natural person who is assigned the account or email address by the 7Rewards mobile App or internet service provider.

Proof of transmission (screenshots or captures etc.) or attempted transmission of an entry or of an attempted entry of any communication, does not constitute proof of delivery or receipt.

  1. Random Drawing: A random drawing will be conducted on or about 04/01/20 from among all eligible entries received during the Promotion Period. Decisions of Sponsor are final and binding in all matters related to this Contest.  Odds of winning depend on the number of entries received.
  2. Prize & Approximate Retail Value (“ARV”): (20) Grand Prize Winners will receive: (1) Rockstar Snowboard each. Total of (20) twenty snowboards to be won.

Prize: (1) Snowboard per winner = ARV $400.00 CAD

Total ARV of all prizes is $8,000.00 CAD. 

Prize consists of only those items specifically listed as part of the prize.  No substitution, cash redemption or transfer of prize by winner permitted, but Sponsor reserves the right to substitute prize of equal or greater value.

  1. How to Claim a Prize. The potential winner will be notified by Contest Sponsors by email in accordance with the contact information provided at the time of entry. To be declared a winner, each potential winner must: (i) correctly answer a required time-limited mathematical skill-testing question without any assistance of any kind whether mechanical or otherwise; (ii) sign and return to Sponsor within the date indicated a form of Declaration of Compliance and Release which confirms compliance with these Official Rules and releases the Sponsor, 7-Eleven and Contest Entities (defined in Section 6 below), and each of their respective direct and indirect parent companies, affiliates, subsidiaries, successors, assigns, franchisees, their advertising, promotion and fulfillment agencies, agents, advisors, contest prize suppliers and each of their employees, officers, directors, agents and representatives from all liability with respect to: (a) the entrant’s participation in this Contest and the awarding, acceptance, use, or misuse of the Prize or for matters that inhibit, reduce or prevent enjoyment of the Prize, (b) traveling to, preparing for, or participating in any Contest-related or prize-related activity; and (c) the publicity rights granted to the Sponsors defined in Rule 8 (the “Release”); and (iv) otherwise comply with these Official Rules. The potential winner may be required to furnish proof of identification that may include a driver’s license or other form of picture identification as part of the verification process.

If a potential winner cannot be located, does not respond within five (5) business days of notification, or fails to: (i) correctly answer the skill-testing question, (ii) sign and return the Release within the required time, or (iii) otherwise comply with these Official Rules, the potential winner will be disqualified and forfeits the Prize and the Sponsor may, at its sole and absolute discretion, select by random draw another eligible entrant from among the remaining eligible entries whom the Sponsor will attempt to contact, and who will be subject to disqualification in the same manner.  Sponsor is not responsible for failed attempts to notify any potential winner. Awarding of the Prize is subject to verification and compliance with these Official Rules. No responsibility is assumed by the Sponsor for any postal mail or overnight delivery returned as undeliverable without a forwarding address.

  1. Eligibility: Open and offered only to legal residents of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and Ontario, void outside Canada, who are the age of majority in the province at the time of entry.  Employees and directors of Rockstar, Inc. (collectively, “Sponsor”), 7-Eleven (“Promotional Participant”) and its parent entities, subsidiaries and affiliated companies, advertising, promotion or production agencies, and their immediate family members or individuals residing in their same household, are not eligible to participate or enter. Void where prohibited.
  2. TERMS AND CONDITIONS; LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY: Entrants are responsible for complying with all applicable federal, provincial, and municipal laws and regulations and with these Official Rules, and by entering, Entrants agree to be bound to these Official Rules. This Contest is subject to all applicable federal, provincial, and municipal laws and regulations. Any attempt by an entrant or other party to tamper with the proper administration of the Contest will disqualify the entrant and may result in civil or criminal action against the entrant or other party and may result in the discontinuation, suspension, modification or cancellation of the Contest. WINNERS AND ENTRANTS AGREE, EXCEPT WHERE PROHIBITED BY LAW, TO RELEASE AND DISCHARGE, HOLD HARMLESS AND INDEMNIFY SPONSOR, 7-ELEVEN CANDA INC, AND THEIR RESPECTIVE PARENTS, AFFILIATED COMPANIES, SUBSIDIARIES, SUCCESSORS, ASSIGNS, PRIZE SUPPLIERS, PRINTERS, ADVERTISING AND PROMOTION AGENCIES AND EACH OF THEIR RESPECTIVE EMPLOYEES, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, REPRESENTATIVES AND AGENTS (COLLECTIVELY, THE “CONTEST ENTITIES”) AND ALL OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE DEVELOPMENT AND EXECUTION OF THIS CONTEST, FROM ANY AND ALL TAX LIABILITY THAT MAY BE IMPOSED OR ASSOCIATED WITH RECEIPT OR USE OF THE PRIZE, AND FROM AND AGAINST ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, ACTIONS, PROCEEDINGS, AND LIABILITY FOR ANY DAMAGES, EXPENSES, FEES, INJURY OR LOSSES (INCLUDING PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH) SUSTAINED IN CONNECTION WITH THE RECEIPT, OWNERSHIP, OR USE OR ENJOYMENT OF ANY PRIZE OR WHILE TRAVELING TO, PREPARING FOR, OR PARTICIPATING IN ANY CONTEST-RELATED OR PRIZE-RELATED ACTIVITY. It is understood that there may be serious risks of bodily injury, death, or property damage associated with the use or misuse of the Prize and by accepting the Prize the Prize winner voluntarily assumes these risks.

 

Contest Entities are not responsible for lost, late, incomplete, inaccurate, stolen, misdirected, undelivered, garbled, illegible or postage-due mail, transactions, entries, text messages or email; or for other errors or difficulties of any kind whether human, mechanical, electronic, computer, network, cellular phone or tower, typographical, printing or otherwise relating to or in connection with the Contest, including, without limitation, errors or difficulties which may occur in connection with the administration of the Contest, the processing of entries or transaction, the announcement of the prizes or in any Contest-related materials.  If, for any reason, the Contest is not capable of running as planned by reason of, but not limited to, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes which Sponsor deems could corrupt or affect the administration, security, fairness, integrity or proper conduct of this Contest, Sponsor reserves the right at its sole discretion to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the Contest and, if terminated, at Sponsor’s sole discretion, select the winners in a random drawing from non-suspect, eligible entries received prior to the action or as otherwise may be deemed fair and equitable by Sponsor.  In no event will the number of prizes awarded exceed the available number of prizes as specified in these Official Rules.

Except where prohibited, all issues and questions concerning the construction, validity, interpretation and enforceability of these Official Rules, or the rights and obligations of the Entrant and Sponsor in connection with the Contest, shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of Canada without giving effect to any choice of law or conflict of law rules. Should any provision of these Official Rules be deemed unenforceable or invalid, the other provisions of these Official Rules shall remain in full force and effect.

Sponsor’s failure to enforce any term of these Official Rules shall not constitute a waiver of that provision.

  1. Publicity. By accepting a Prize, winner consents to the publication and use of his/her name, municipality of residence, comments, voice, likeness and photographs in any form, manner or media whether now known or hereafter devised, including, without limitation, in print, radio, television and on the Internet for any purpose in connection with the Contest including, without limitation, for the purposes of advertising and trade, and promoting the Sponsor and each of its products and services, without further notice or compensation. The Prize winner agrees to cooperate with Sponsor in arranging for photographs or other forms of publicity and to be available for photographs or other forms of publicity on reasonable notice by Sponsor.
  2. Personal Information/Privacy. Personal information collected from entrants may be used by Contest Sponsors for the purposes of administering the Contest and prize fulfillment, in accordance with Rockstar’s privacy policy available at http://www.rockstarenergy.ca/privacy.php and 7-eleven.ca/privacySponsor will not sell, share or otherwise disclose personal information of entrants with third parties, other than to third parties engaged by Rockstar pursuant to the administration of the Contest or as otherwise permitted or required by law. By entering the Contest, entrants consent to the manner of collection, use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with administering the Contest. By entering the Contest, entrants acknowledge that Rockstar may communicate with the entrant via email with respect to communicating the results of the Contest.
  3. Sponsor: Rockstar, Inc., Las Vegas, NV, USA.

acf.page_content:
7-Eleven Canada Official Rules and Regulations
“WIN 1 of 7 TRIPS TO HAWAII 7REWARDS” CONTEST

 

      1. CONTEST PERIOD

      This contest is brought to you exclusively by 7-Eleven Canada, Inc. (the “Contest Sponsor“). The “7 Trips to Hawaii with 7Rewards” Contest (the “Contest” or “contest“) commences Monday, January 6, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT and ends Tuesday, March 3, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT and is separated into the following seven (7) contest periods (each a “Contest Period” and collectively the “Contest Periods“):

      1. January 6, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to January 17, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT;
      2. January 18, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to January 24, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT;
      3. January 25, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to January 31, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT;
      4. February 1, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to February 7, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT;
      5. February 8, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to February 14, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT;
      6. February 15, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to February 21, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT; and
      7. February 22, 2020 at 12:00:01 am PT to March 3, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT.
      1. ELIGIBILITY

      NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. The contest is open to legal residents of the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and Ontario who are a natural person and the age of majority in the province he/she resides at the time of entry.

      Notwithstanding the above, this contest is not open to employees, representatives, agents, officers or directors (or those with whom such persons are domiciled, whether related or not) of: (i) the Contest Sponsor, their respective divisions, subsidiaries and affiliates; (ii) Contest Sponsor’ advertising and promotional agencies, contest suppliers, prize suppliers, and any other entity involved in the development, production, implementation, administration, judging or fulfillment of the Contest (collectively, the “Contest Parties”).

      1. HOW TO ENTER

      (a)  ENTRY WITH RETAIL PURCHASE:

      Step 1: Receive a link to download the 7-Eleven mobile application for the 7Rewards customer loyalty program (the “App“) by texting “Kona” to the mobile number 711247 and then download the App and create a 7Rewards account or visit 7rewards.ca and create a 7Rewards account; or register at the customer facing display at a participating 7-Eleven store, if the entrant already has a 7-Eleven member ID barcode go to Step 2 and skip this Step 1.

      Step 2: Once the entrant has completed Step 1, with each transaction made at a participating 7-Eleven location, if he/she scans the 7-Eleven member ID barcode or enters a phone number associated with a 7-Eleven member ID barcode at the display in store with any 7-Eleven proprietary coffee or hot beverage purchase, he/she will receive one (1) unique entry in the Contest for the applicable Contest Period for each such 7-Eleven proprietary coffee or hot beverage purchase. Any 7-Eleven paper cup is considered a proprietary coffee cup, refillable 7-Eleven mugs are included.

      NOTE: The App is not compatible for download via mobile devices operating on the BlackBerry® or Windows® mobile operating systems. Text messaging fees may apply depending on the entrant’s mobile device carrier and text messaging package.  Such fees are the responsibility of the entrant/account holder. Text messaging may not be available in all areas or with all mobile service providers.  Entrant must be the person in whose name the mobile device account for the mobile device used to enter the Contest via mobile device is registered (the “Mobile Account Holder“) or have the express permission of the Mobile Account Holder. Entries made via mobile device without the permission of the Mobile Account Holder may be disqualified, at the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.

       (b) NO PURCHASE ENTRY:

       

      To obtain entries without making a purchase, visit https://7-eleven.ca/promos/kona/and complete the online entry form by following all online instructions including agreeing to be bound by the Contest rules. Limit one online (1) entry per Contest Period, per person/e-mail/mobile device account (you must complete in full a new online entry each Contest Period to be valid).

       

      NOTE:  Any internet access and usage charges imposed by online service providers will be the responsibility of the entrant.

       

      Entrants may use only one (1) e-mail address or mobile account to enter. If it is discovered by the Contest Sponsor (using any evidence or other information made available to or otherwise discovered by the Contest Sponsor) that any person has attempted to use multiple names, identities, multiple accounts, or, and/or any automated, macro, script, robotic or other system(s) or program(s) to enter or otherwise participate in or disrupt this Contest in any way (as determined by Contest Sponsor in their sole and absolute discretion); then he/she may be disqualified from the Contest in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.  Any entry may be rejected if (in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor) the entry form is not fully completed with all required information and submitted and received during the applicable Contest Period.

      Proof of transmission (screenshots or captures etc.) or attempted transmission of an entry or of an attempted entry of any communication, does not constitute proof of delivery or receipt.

      The Contest Sponsor reserve the right, in their sole and absolute discretion, to require proof of identity and/or eligibility (in a form acceptable to the Contest Sponsor – including, without limitation, government issued photo identification): (i) for the purposes of verifying an individual’s eligibility to participate in this Contest; (ii) for the purposes of verifying the eligibility and/or legitimacy of an entry (or a purported entry) for the purposes of this Contest; and/or (iii) for any other reason the Contest Sponsor deems necessary, in its sole and absolute discretion, for the purposes of administering this contest in accordance with these Contest rules.  Failure to provide such proof to the complete satisfaction of the Contest Sponsor within the timeline specified by the Contest Sponsor may result in disqualification in the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.

      By entering this contest, entrants agree to be bound by these Contest rules and the decisions of the Contest Sponsor and contest judges with regards to all aspects of this Contest, which are final and binding (without right of appeal).

       

      1. PRIZES

      There is one (1) prize trip for two (2) to Honolulu, Hawaii (each, a “Prize“) available to be won for each of the seven (7) Contest Periods.  Each Prize consists of:

      • Return economy class round trip airfare for two (2) persons departing from the major international Canadian airport closest to the winner’s place of residence to the Prize destination. Hotel accommodation with one room (Double Occupancy). Desired dates of travel will be subject to availability; blackout dates will apply. Plus $500 prepaid Visa or Mastercard.
      • Approximate retail value of each trip Prize is CAD$3,800.00. Total contest Prizes for all seven (7) of the Contest Periods valued at CAD$26,600.00.
      • No difference between the actual and approximate retail values will be awarded. Choice of flights, airline(s), hotel accommodations without limitation, hotel room size and occupancy are at the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.  Prize must be accepted as outlined in these Contest rules and cannot be exchanged or redeemed for cash. Substitutions not allowed.

       

      1. METHOD OF AWARDING PRIZES

      AWARDING PRIZES: After the end of each of the seven (7) Contest Periods, there will be one (1) draw conducted in Surrey, British Columbia, at which time one (1) potential Prize winner will be randomly selected from all eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Contest rules.

      See Prize draw schedule below based on Pacific Time zone.

PRIZE DRAW SCHEDULE

Entry Period,Start Date,Start Time (PT), End Date, End Time (PT), Contest Period, Draw Date
1: Week 1 Draw (Trip 1) – Jan 6 12:00:01 AM – Jan 17 11:59:59PM, Jan 20, 2020
2: Week 2 Draw (Trip 2) – Jan 18 12:00:01 AM – Jan 24 11:59:59PM, Jan 25, 2020
3: Week 3 Draw (Trip 3) – Jan 25 12:00:01 AM – Jan 31 11:59:59PM, Feb 1, 2020
4: Week 4 Draw (Trip 4) – Feb 1 12:00:01 AM – Feb 7 11:59:59PM, Feb 8, 2020
5: Week 5 Draw (Trip 5) – Feb 8 12:00:01 AM – Feb 14 11:59:59PM, Feb 15, 2020
6: Week 6 Draw (Trip 6) – Feb 15 12:00:01 AM – Feb 21 11:59:59PM, Feb 22, 2020
7: Week 7 Draw (Final Trip 7) – Feb 22 12:00:01 AM – March 3 11:59:59PM, March 4, 2020

Odds of winning a Prize depends on the number of eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Contest rules during the applicable Contest Period.

Prize winners and guests must abide by all travel policies. Contest Sponsor reserves the right to revoke the full or any part of a Prize from any winner or winner’s guest who the Contest Sponsor and/or venue personnel deem may, in their sole and absolute discretion, be a safety risk, have violated any venue policy or law, and/or may bring Contest Sponsor into disrepute. Trips awarded must be booked by December 15, 2020 and travel must be complete by April 30, 2021.  Subject to these Contest rules, travel dates will be determined by the winner and arranged by a third party travel agency. The details, locations, hotel availability and selected details are determined and approved solely by the Contest Sponsor and no alternative travel destinations will be available. Winner understands that there are inherent risks involved in travel and that these risks may be present before, during and after the trip.  Winner is responsible for valid ID such as passports and obtaining insurance they deem necessary for travel. Contest Sponsor is not responsible for any element of the Prize or for any expenses incurred as a consequence of flight cancellation, delay, travel or medical insurance or any other travel requirement outside of what is included in the Prize details listed above. Contest Sponsor is not responsible and will have no liability if the winner and/or his/her guest is for any reason not permitted to travel by the relevant airport authorities or misses a flight or other travel element. An unclaimed and/or unused Prize element will remain the property of Contest Sponsor, as applicable.

If a potential winner is of the age of majority in his/her province of residence, he/she may select a Minor as his/her guest, however the Minor must be his/her child and/or the selected entrant legal guardian of the said Minor.

All Prizes must be accepted as awarded and may not be transferred, exchanged, assigned or refunded. The Contest Sponsor reserves the right, in their sole and absolute discretion, to substitute any Prize or a portion thereof with a prize or prizes of at least equal value (including, without limitation, at the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor, an alternate trip to an alternate destination based on availability in the event of the unavailability, for whatever reason, of the advertised Prize or any portion thereof.

Selected Prize entrants will be contacted by email to the email account created in the 7Rewards program sign up process, or as provided on the no purchase entry form web page, with further information on how to be confirmed as a winner and claim the Prize.  If a selected entrant cannot be reached, for whatever reason,  of being notified by email within ten (10) days, another entrant may be randomly selected (from among the remaining eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Contest rules) at the sole and absolute discretion of the Contest Sponsor.

Before being declared a winner of a Prize, each selected entrant must correctly answer, unaided, a skill-testing question to be administered by telephone at a pre-arranged mutually convenient time and complete, sign and return a Declaration and Release Form in the form provided by Contest Sponsor (and any other documents, as applicable, as may be requested by Contest Sponsor) within ten (10) days of receipt (the “Prize Claim Date“).

If a potential Prize winner cannot be reached/located, fails to reply within ten (10) days following contact by the Contest Sponsor representative by email to claim their Prize, is not in compliance with these Contest rules, incorrectly answers the skill-testing question, declines the Prize, fails to return all Declaration and Release Forms (and any other documents, as applicable) by the Prize Claim Date, cannot travel for whatever reason before April 30, 2021, or if email or other correspondence between the Contest Sponsor and potential winner is returned as undeliverable, the Prize may be forfeited by that potential winner and the Contest Sponsor reserves the right to randomly select another potential winner from among the remaining eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Contest rules. All selected entrants must confirm travel reservations on or before December 15, 2020.

Prizes will be awarded, subject to these Contest rules, upon correctly answering the skill-testing question, receipt of the properly completed and executed Declaration and Release Forms (and any other documents as may be requested by Contest Sponsor, as applicable) and verification of Prize winner.

  1. GENERAL

For each Prize, bookings are subject to availability, changes in itinerary and other restrictions. Blackout dates may apply.  At the time of booking, winner must provide valid travel documents for both the prize winner and his/her travelling guest. Bookings are also subject to all rules and regulations of the applicable airline or other carrier. Prize must be booked through Contest Sponsor promotional travel agency. Prize cannot be modified by winner. All bookings are subject to existing availability and are subject to change at the sole discretion of the Contest Sponsor. The Contest Sponsor shall have no responsibility for trip cancellations, alterations, weather delays, weather cancellations or other changes to the trip itinerary and by accepting the Prize, the winner acknowledges and accepts such risks. The Prize winner and his/her guest will be responsible for all costs and expenses not specifically stated above as included in the Prize including, but not limited to, transfer between airports to travel destinations and hotel, side trips, ground transportation (other than what has been outlined in the Prize description above), travel and health insurance, personal expenses, medical expenses, meals, beverages, gratuities, gift shop purchases, phone calls and all other expenses and travel requirements not specifically described above as being included in the Prize. In the event a Prize winner(s) requires specialized services due to a disability, the winner will be directed to a service provider for support. Prize winner assumes all liabilities. In no event shall the Contest Sponsor be liable for any indirect or punitive incidental, special consequential losses, damages or injury resulting from, before, during or after travel. The Prize winner will be required by the airline or hotel to provide an accepted and valid credit card to cover incidental charges (including but not limited to: telephone charges, special purchases, etc.). The Prize winner and his/her travelling guest must travel on the same itinerary and must each have valid travel documents and identification. Necessary travel documents are solely the responsibility of the winner and his/her travelling guest. In order to be entitled to accompany the winner on the Prize trip, the winner’s guest or his/her parent or legal guardian should the guest be a minor in his/her province of residence must sign and return the Contest Sponsor Declaration and Release Form by the timeframe indicated on the form.  The Contest Parties and each of their respective officers, directors, employees, agents, representatives, successors and assigns (collectively, the “Released Parties“) are not responsible in the event winner and/or travel guest are refused entry into destination city or re-entry into their Province of residence for whatever reason. The Released Parties do not assume responsibility should any portion of the Prize trip be cancelled, delayed, suspended or rescheduled for any reason. If, for any reason, an event included as part of the Prize does not occur, that portion of the Prize will be forfeited without additional compensation and the remainder of the Prize will be awarded.  Refusal to accept a Prize releases the Released Parties of all responsibility and obligations towards the winner of such Prize.

The approximate retail value of the Prize as stated by the Contest Sponsor in point of sale advertising, and other advertising, promotion materials, and/or in these Contest rules is subject to price fluctuations in the consumer marketplace based on, among other things, the passage of time between the date the approximate retail value is stated by the Contest Sponsor and the date the Prizes are awarded or redeemed. If, at the time the Prize is redeemed or awarded, the actual prevailing retail purchase price for the Prize is less than the approximate retail value stated by the Contest Sponsor in point of sale, in advertising, promotion materials, and/or in these Contest rules, the Prize winner will not be entitled to a cheque or cash for the price difference.

The decisions of the Contest Sponsor and/or the judges are final and binding, without right of appeal, with respect to all aspects of this contest and entrant agrees to abide by the Contest rules and all of the instructions and decisions of the Contest Sponsor and/or judges. In the event of any dispute regarding the interpretation of these Contest rules, the decision or interpretation of the Contest Sponsor and/or judges shall prevail.

Unless otherwise deemed appropriate by the Contest Sponsor for the administration of the contest based on the circumstances, no communications will be entered into except with selected entrants. Once Prize winners have been verified and confirmed, the Prize winners’ names will be posted at www.7rewards.ca.

All entries become the property of the Contest Sponsor. Any entry that is late, incomplete, altered, or contains false information, is invalid. The Released Parties are not responsible for lost, stolen, delayed, damaged or misdirected claims or entries or for any problems or technical malfunction of any Internet or telephone network or broadcast transmission during the Contest Periods. The Released Parties are not responsible for any errors or omissions with respect to the printing or advertising of this contest and reserves the right to withdraw, amend or cancel this contest in the event of a printing or administrative error.

In the event, due to a printing, manufacturing, mechanical or other error, more prizes are claimed than are intended to be awarded according to these Contest rules, prizes will stop being awarded when the Contest Sponsor becomes aware of an error respecting the number of prizes and the Contest Sponsor reserve the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to conduct a random draw from amongst all eligible and approved prize claimants whose claims have not yet been redeemed to award the remaining number of advertised prizes. In no event will the Released Parties be liable for more than the stated number of prizes contained in these Contest rules.

The Released Parties accept no responsibility for loss, damage or claims caused by the awarded Prizes or the contest itself. By entering, entrant releases and holds harmless the Released Parties from any and all liability for any injuries, loss or damage of any kind arising from or in connection with the contest or any Prize (or a portion thereof) won.

Without limiting the release of liability provisions herein, and for greater certainty, the Released Parties will not be liable for: a) any incorrect or inaccurate information, whether caused by contest website users or by any equipment or programming associated with or utilized in the contest or by any technical or human error which may occur in the processing of entries in the contest; b) any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect or delay in operation of the contest website or any transmission in connection with the contest; c) any communications line failure, theft, destruction or unauthorized access to, or alteration of, entries; d) any problems with, or technical malfunction of, any telephone network or lines, computer on-line systems, servers or providers, computer equipment, software, or failure of email which may occur for any reason whatsoever, including technical problems or traffic congestion on the Internet or at any website or combination thereof; or e) any injury or damage to entrants’ or to any other person’s computer or other device related to or resulting from participating or downloading materials in this contest. If the contest is not capable of running as planned for any reason, including infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures, or any other cause of any nature whatsoever beyond the reasonable control of the Released Parties which corrupt or affect the administration, security or proper conduct of this contest, the Contest Sponsor reserve the right at their sole and absolute discretion to, without advance notice, terminate or suspend the contest, in whole or in part, or modify it in any way.

Where applicable and in the event of a dispute as to who submitted an entry, the Contest Sponsor reserve the right, in their sole and absolute discretion, to deem the entry to have been submitted by the Authorized Account Holder of the email address submitted at the time of entry or

Mobile Account Holder. “Authorized Account Holder” is defined as the natural person who is assigned to an email address by an Internet access provider, on-line service provider or other organization (e.g., business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning email addresses for the domain associated with the submitted email address. Selected entrant may be required to provide the Contest Sponsor with proof that he/she (i) is the Authorized Account Holder of the email address associated with the selected entry; (ii) is the Mobile Account Holder; or (iii) has  the express permission of the Mobile Account Holder to enter.

The Contest Sponsor reserve the right at their sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual from the contest, and to ban that individual from any future promotion of the Contest Sponsor, if the Contest Sponsor find or believe such individual to be tampering with the entry process or the operation of the contest or where applicable, the contest website; to be acting in violation of the Contest rules or in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner, or with intent to annoy, abuse, threaten or harass the Contest Sponsor, the Contest Sponsor’ agencies, other entrants or any other person. ANY ATTEMPT BY AN ENTRANT OR ANY OTHER PERSON TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE ANY WEBSITE OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE CONTEST IS A VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS AND SHOULD SUCH AN ATTEMPT BE MADE, THE CONTEST SPONSOR RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK DAMAGES FROM ANY SUCH PERSON TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.

By entering this contest, you consent to the Contest Sponsor use, should you become a winner, of your name, place of residence and photograph or other likeness, without further compensation or notice, for publicity, advertising or informational purposes in any media or format (including the Internet) in connection with this contest.

7-Eleven Canada, Inc. (“7-Eleven“) is collecting personal data about the entrants for the purpose of administering this contest and may share this information with the promotional travel agency for the purpose of the administration of the Contest. No further informational or marketing communications will be received by entrants, unless the entrant has specifically opted-in to receive such communications or such communications are otherwise permitted by applicable law. The Contest Sponsor respect your right to privacy of your personal information. Please review 7-Eleven’s Privacy Policy at http://7eleven.ca/privacy for details on the manner in which 7-Eleven collects, uses, discloses, and otherwise manages your personal information.

This contest shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the laws of Canada applicable therein.

The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of these Contest rules shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision. In the event that any provision is determined to be invalid or otherwise unenforceable or illegal, these Contest rules shall otherwise remain in effect and shall be construed in accordance with their terms as if the invalid or illegal provision were not contained herein.

The Contest Sponsor reserves the right to adjust any of the dates, timeframes and/or other contest mechanics stipulated in these Contest rules, to the extent necessary, for purposes of verifying compliance by any entrant or entry with these Contest rules, or as a result of any technical or other problems, or in light of any other circumstances which, in the opinion of the Contest Sponsor, in their sole and absolute discretion, affect the proper administration of the contest as contemplated in these Contest rules, or for any other reason. The Contest Sponsor also reserves the right to cancel this contest at any time.

In the event of any discrepancy or inconsistency between the terms and conditions of these Contest rules and disclosures or other statements contained in any Contest-related materials, the terms and conditions of these Contest rules shall prevail, govern and control to the fullest extent permitted by law.

acf.page_content:
Official Rules and Regulations
7Rewards $20,000 Slurpee Scholarship Promotion

 

  1. PROMOTION PERIOD

The “Earn a $20,000 Scholarship” Promotion ( “Promotion“) commences Monday, November 4, 2019 at 12:00:01 pm PT and ends Sunday, January 5, 2020 at 11:59:59 pm PT (the “Promotion Period“). This Promotion is sponsored by 7-Eleven Canada (the “Sponsor“).

  1. ELIGIBILITY

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. The Promotion is open to legal residents of the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba and Ontario who are eighteen (18) years or older at the time of entry and currently active or previously active in 2017 or 2018 at a University, College or educational institute in BC, AB, SASK, MB, or ON. All entrants must be members of the 7Rewards program.

Notwithstanding the above, this Promotion is not open to employees, representatives, agents, officers or directors (or those with whom such persons are domiciled, whether related or not) of: (i) the Promotion Sponsor, Participating product sponsors,  (the “Participating Sponsors”), its respective divisions, subsidiaries and affiliates; (ii) Promotion Sponsor advertising and promotional agencies, Participating Sponsors, Promotion suppliers, prize suppliers, and any other entity involved in the development, production, implementation, administration, judging or fulfillment of the Promotion (collectively, the “Promotion Parties”).

  1. HOW TO ENTER and QUALIFY:

Step 1: Download the 7-Eleven APP (the “App”) by texting “JOIN” to 711247 or by visiting 7rewards.ca and obtaining a 7Rewards barcode on the website. (NOTE: the App is not compatible for download via mobile devices operating on the BlackBerry® or Windows® mobile operating systems);

Step 2: following all instructions provided via the App or at 7rewards.ca, create an account to obtain a scanable member ID barcode; including acceptance of the Terms and Conditions and Privacy for the App.

Step 3: Once the entrant has obtained a 7Rewards membership, he/she must visit the following website: https://7-eleven.ca/promos/20kscholarship/ and submit your story and tell us in 100 (one hundred) words or less how you have contributed or acted in a leadership capacity in the community.  By clicking submit, the entrant will obtain one (1) entry in the Promotion. Limit one (1) entry during promotional period November 4 – January 5, 2020 per person/e-mail.

NOTE: Text messaging and/or data rates may apply depending on the entrant’s mobile device carrier and text messaging package.  Such fees are the responsibility of the entrant/account holder. Text messaging may not be available in all areas or with all mobile service providers.  Entrant must be the person in whose name the mobile device account for the mobile device used to enter the Promotion via mobile device is registered (the “Mobile Account Holder”) or have the express permission of the Mobile Account Holder. Entries made via mobile device without the permission of the Mobile Account Holder may be disqualified, at the sole and absolute discretion of the Promotion Sponsor. Any internet access and usage charges imposed by online service providers will be the responsibility of the entrant.

By participating in the Contest, each entrant agrees to be bound by Rules and by the interpretation of these Rules by the Sponsor, and further warrants and represents that his/her submission:

  1. is original to him/her and that the entrant has all necessary rights;
  2. does not and will not violate any law, statute, ordinance or regulations;

iii.            does not contain any reference to any third parties, unless consent has been obtained from all such individuals;

  1. will not give rise to any claims of infringement, invasion of privacy or publicity, or infringe on any rights and/or interests of any third party, or give rise to any claims for payment whatsoever; and
  2. is not defamatory, trade libelous, pornographic or obscene, and further that it will not contain, depict, include, discuss or involve, without limitation, any of the following:

             Nudity; Explicit, graphic or excessive sexual activity; Crude, vulgar or offensive language and/or symbols; Derogatory characterizations of any ethnic, racial, sexual or religious groups; Content that endorses, condones or discusses any illegal, inappropriate or risky activity, behaviour or conduct; Personal information of individuals, including without limitation, names and addresses (physical or e-mail); Conduct or other activities in violation of these Rules; Commercial messages, comparisons or solicitations for products or services; any identifiable third party products and/or trade-marks, brands or logos; URLs or links to any websites; and any other content that is or could be considered inappropriate, unsuitable or offensive, all as determined by the Sponsor and/or the contest judges in their sole discretion.

Entrants may use only one (1) e-mail address or mobile account to enter. If it is discovered by the Promotion Sponsor (using any evidence or other information made available to or otherwise discovered by the Promotion Sponsor) that any person has attempted to use multiple names, identities, multiple accounts, or, and/or any automated, macro, script, robotic or other system(s) or program(s) to enter or otherwise participate in or disrupt this Promotion in any way (as determined by the Promotion Sponsor in its sole and absolute discretion); then he/she may be disqualified from the Promotion in the sole and absolute discretion of the Promotion Sponsor.  Any entry may be rejected if (in the sole and absolute discretion of the Promotion Sponsor) the entry is not fully completed with all required information or if the entry is not submitted and received during the Promotion Period.  Proof of transmission (screenshots or captures etc.) or attempted transmission of an entry or of an attempted entry of any communication, does not constitute proof of delivery or receipt.

The Promotion Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to require proof of identity; proof of educational status; and/or eligibility (in a form acceptable to the Promotion Sponsor – including, without limitation, government issued photo identification): (i) for the purposes of verifying an individual’s eligibility to participate in this Promotion; (ii) for the purposes of verifying the eligibility and/or legitimacy of an entry (or a purported entry) for the purposes of this Promotion; and/or (iii) for any other reason the Promotion Sponsor deems necessary, in its sole and absolute discretion, for the purposes of administering this Promotion in accordance with these Promotion rules.  Failure to provide such proof to the complete satisfaction of the Promotion Sponsor within the timeline specified by the Promotion Sponsor may result in disqualification in the sole and absolute discretion of the Promotion Sponsor.

By entering this Promotion, entrants agree to be bound by these Promotion rules and the decisions of the Promotion Sponsor with regards to all aspects of this Promotion, including without limitation eligibility and/or disqualification of entrants and/or entries, which are final and binding (without right of appeal).

 

  1. PRIZES

There is one (1) prize of twenty-thousand ($20,000) Canadian dollars (the “Prize”), payable by cheque.  Total value of prizing available: $20,000 CAD.

  1. METHOD OF AWARDING PRIZE

In Surrey, British Columbia, on or about January 9, 2020, a panel of judges will review and select one (1) potential winner from all eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with the rules.

Selected entrant will be contacted by email which matches the online entry form or the address used when creating an account on the 7-Eleven App with further information on how to be confirmed as a winner and claim the Prize.  If a selected entrant cannot be reached, for whatever reason, by the date, another entrant may be randomly selected (from among the remaining eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Promotion rules) at the sole and absolute discretion of the Promotion Sponsor.

Before being declared a winner of the Prize, the selected entrant must correctly answer, unaided, a mathematical skill-testing question to be administered by telephone or email and complete, sign and return a Declaration and Release Form (and any other documents, as applicable) within seven (7) days of receipt (the “Prize Claim Date”).

If the potential Prize winner, cannot be reached/located, fails to reply within seven (7) days following contact by the Promotion Sponsor representative, is not in compliance with these Promotion rules, incorrectly answers the skill-testing question, declines the Prize, fails to return the Declaration and Release Form (and any other documents, as applicable) by the Prize Claim Date, or if email or other correspondence between the Promotion Sponsor and potential winner is not responded to or is returned as undeliverable, the Prize may be forfeited by that potential winner and the Promotion Sponsor reserves the right to randomly select another potential winner from among the remaining eligible entries submitted and received in accordance with these Promotion rules.

Prize will be awarded, subject to these Promotion rules, upon correctly answering the mathematical skill-testing question, receipt of the properly completed and executed Declaration and Release Form, and any other documents, as applicable, and verification of Prize winner.

 GENERAL

  1. The approximate retail value of the Prize as stated by the Promotion Sponsor and / or Participating Sponsor in point of sale advertising, and other advertising, promotion materials, and/or in these Promotion rules is subject to price fluctuations in the consumer marketplace based on, among other things, the passage of time between the date the approximate retail value is stated by the Promotion Sponsor and the date the Prize is awarded or redeemed. If, at the time the Prize is redeemed or awarded, the actual prevailing retail purchase price for the Prize is less than the approximate retail value stated by the Promotion Sponsor in point of sale, television and print advertising, promotion materials, and/or in these Promotion rules, the prize winner will not be entitled to a cheque or cash for the price difference.
  2. The decisions of the Promotion Sponsor and/or the judges are final and binding, without right of appeal, with respect to all aspects of this Promotion and entrant agrees to abide by the Promotion rules and all of the instructions and decisions of the Promotion Sponsor and/or judges. In the event of any dispute regarding the interpretation of these Promotion rules, the decision or interpretation of the Promotion Sponsor and/or judges shall prevail.
  3. Unless otherwise deemed appropriate by the Promotion Sponsor for the administration of the Promotion based on the circumstances, no communications will be entered into except with selected entrants. Once Prize winner has been verified and confirmed, the Prize winner’s name will be posted at www.7rewards.ca.
  4. All entries become the property of the Promotion Sponsor. Any entry that is late, incomplete, altered, or contains false information, is invalid. The Promotion Parties and each of their respective officers, directors, employees, agents, representatives, successors collectively, the “Released Parties”) are not responsible for lost, stolen, delayed, damaged or misdirected claims or entries or for any problems or technical malfunction of any Internet or telephone network or broadcast transmission during the Promotion Period. The Released Parties are not responsible for any errors or omissions with respect to the printing or advertising of this Promotion and reserves the right to withdraw, amend or cancel this Promotion in the event of a printing or administrative error.
  5. In the event, due to a printing, manufacturing, mechanical or other error, more prizes are claimed than are intended to be awarded according to these Promotion rules, prizes will stop being awarded when the Promotion Sponsor becomes aware of an error respecting the number of prizes and the Promotion Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to conduct a random draw from amongst all eligible and approved prize claimants whose claims have not yet been redeemed to award the remaining number of advertised prizes. In no event will the Released Parties be liable for more than the stated number of prizes contained in these official Promotion rules.
  6. The Released Parties accept no responsibility for loss, damage or claims caused by the awarded prizes or the Promotion itself. By entering, entrant releases and holds harmless the Released Parties from any and all liability for any injuries, loss or damage of any kind arising from or in connection with the Promotion or any prize (or a portion thereof) won. The Prize Supplier is the supplier of the Prize, but is not responsible for the conduct or administration of the Promotion.
  7. Without limiting the release of liability provisions herein, and for greater certainty, the Released Parties will not be liable for: a) any incorrect or inaccurate information, whether caused by Promotion website users or by any equipment or programming associated with or utilized in the Promotion or by any technical or human error which may occur in the processing of entries in the Promotion; b) any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect or delay in operation of the Promotion website or any transmission in connection with the Promotion; c) any communications line failure, theft, destruction or unauthorized access to, or alteration of, entries; d) any problems with, or technical malfunction of, any telephone network or lines, computer on-line systems, servers or providers, computer equipment, software, or failure of email which may occur for any reason whatsoever, including technical problems or traffic congestion on the Internet or at any website or combination thereof; or e) any injury or damage to entrants’ or to any other person’s computer or other device related to or resulting from participating or downloading materials in this Promotion. If the Promotion is not capable of running as planned for any reason, including infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures, or any other cause of any nature whatsoever beyond the reasonable control of the Released Parties which corrupt or affect the administration, security or proper conduct of this Promotion, the Promotion Sponsor reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to, without advance notice, terminate or suspend the Promotion, in whole or in part, or modify it in any way.
  8. Where applicable and in the event of a dispute as to who submitted an entry, the Promotion Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to deem the entry to have been submitted by the Authorized Account Holder of the email address submitted at the time of entry or Mobile Account Holder. “Authorized Account Holder” is defined as the natural person who is assigned to an email address by an Internet access provider, on-line service provider or other organization (e.g., business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning email addresses for the domain associated with the submitted email address. Selected entrant may be required to provide the Promotion Sponsor with proof that he/she (i) is the Authorized Account Holder of the email address associated with the selected entry; (ii) is the Mobile Account Holder; or (iii) has the express permission of the Mobile Account Holder to enter.
  9. The Promotion Sponsor reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual from the Promotion, and to ban that individual from any future promotion of the Promotion Sponsor, if the Promotion Sponsor finds or believes such individual to be tampering with the entry process or the operation of the Promotion or where applicable, the Promotion website; to be acting in violation of the Promotion rules or in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner, or with intent to annoy, abuse, threaten or harass the Promotion Sponsor, the Promotion Sponsor agencies, other entrants or any other person. ANY ATTEMPT BY AN ENTRANT OR ANY OTHER PERSON TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE ANY WEBSITE OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE PROMOTION IS A VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS AND SHOULD SUCH AN ATTEMPT BE MADE, THE PROMOTION SPONSOR RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK DAMAGES FROM ANY SUCH PERSON TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.
  10. By entering this Promotion, you consent to the Promotion Sponsor, should you become a winner, of your name, place of residence and photograph or other likeness, without further compensation or notice, for publicity, advertising or informational purposes in any media or format (including the Internet) in connection with this Promotion.
  11. 7-Eleven Canada, Inc. (“7-Eleven”) is collecting personal data about the entrants for the purpose of administering this Promotion and may share this information with. parties retained by the Promotion Sponsor in connection with the administration of the Promotion. No further informational or marketing communications will be received by entrants, unless the entrant has specifically opted-in to receive such communications. The Promotion Sponsor respects your right to privacy of your personal information. Please review 7-Eleven’s Privacy Policy at https://7-eleven.ca/privacy/ for details on the manner in which the Promotion Sponsor collects, uses, discloses, and otherwise manages your personal information.
  12. This Promotion shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the laws of Canada applicable therein.
  13. The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of these Promotion rules shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision. In the event that any provision is determined to be invalid or otherwise unenforceable or illegal, these Promotion rules shall otherwise remain in effect and shall be construed in accordance with their terms as if the invalid or illegal provision were not contained herein.
  14. The Promotion Sponsor reserves the right to adjust any of the dates, timeframes and/or other Promotion mechanics stipulated in these Promotion rules, to the extent necessary, for purposes of verifying compliance by any entrant or entry with these Promotion rules, or as a result of any technical or other problems, or in light of any other circumstances which, in the opinion of the Promotion Sponsor, in its sole and absolute discretion, affect the proper administration of the Promotion as contemplated in these Promotion rules, or for any other reason.
  15. In the event of any discrepancy or inconsistency between the terms and conditions of these rules and disclosures or other statements contained in any Promotion or Promotion-related materials, the terms and conditions of these Promotion rules shall prevail, govern and control to the fullest extent permitted by law.
